snippet: BUTTERFIELD--Mary Duryea "Missy" died peacefully on January 9th. Loving mother to John Peck (Men) and Nina Noel (Charlie). Devoted stepmother to three and grandmother to four boys. Her sparkle and laughter will be missed by all. 1
lead_paragraph: BUTTERFIELD--Mary Duryea "Missy" died peacefully on January 9th. Loving mother to John Peck (Men) and Nina Noel (Charlie). Devoted stepmother to three and grandmother to four boys. Her sparkle and laughter will be missed by all. 1

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  BUTTERFIELD, MARY DURYEA "MISSY" DIED PEACEFULLY ON JANUARY 9TH. LOVING MOTHER TO JOHN PECK (MEN) AND NINA NOEL (CHARLIE). DEVOTED STEPMOTHER TO THREE AND GRANDMOTHER TO FOUR BOYS. HER SPARKLE AND LAUGHTER WILL BE MISSED BY ALL. 1
